author: Adeline
text: kept canceling my order.
title: kept canceling my order.

author: Brandon
text:
Everything was in the up and up. I received a real Xbox Series X in a timely manner for the price that was advertised. Advertised price is deceptive. Just know you will pay almost $60 in taxes and another %12 processing fee above advertised cost and another $19.95 for shipping.
Xbox Series X advertized price: $590
Sales tax: $55.21
Processing fee: $ 26.55
Shipping: $19.95
XBOX Series X total: $692. 21 HOLY Crap!! 
That's a lot of extra fees! Be aware!
title: Xbox Series X was delivered. Price is a little deceptive.

author: matt forkan
text: Charged $224 for a pair of sneakers but received no confirmation, no email, no nothing. Now have to wait at least 7 days for the charge to reverse and stock x are impossible to get ahold of to expedite the charge being returned. Yet another company willing to take money 24/7 but not willing to offer support 24/7. Should be a crime to operate a business like this
title: Charged $224 for a pair of sneakers but…

author: Figura Boost
text: This is not a normal store. Stockx is just a middle man between the seller and the buyer. The seller first has to ship to stockx  and stock x then ships to you which typically takes around two weeks for you to get your item( if lucky). Cancelling an order is difficult unless you wait 30 minutes to chat with a rep. The item i wanted was $236 and i found them in finish line for $222 and they were shipped directly to me in less than 4 days.
title: Two weeks to receive item

author: Bryce
text: Took a few weeks before they canceled and took even longer to get my money back.
title: Canceled order

author: Potion
text: My package was supposed to arrive a few days ago, it arrived at the facility over 2 weeks ago and was almost instantly authenticated but now its been awaiting packaging for over 2 weeks.
title: Slow service

author: Alishanae
text: The return/exchange policy sucks. Spending that kind of momey should come with those options. Email for contact is also a sucky way to communicate especially since you dont do exchanges. First and last time. Great product barrel customer service.
title: The return/exchange policy sucks

author: Nathan
text:
Got a serious defect on the shoe I received. Has a big bulge on the side idk how they made it threw the inspection process very disappointed 
*update* inspect your shoes right away because anything over 3 days they will do nothing for you so reaching out will do u no good
title: Got a serious defect on the shoe I…

author: Dustin Barnes
text: You can't get a refund for shoes that don't fit they just expect you to re sell them when you get them and they are the wrong size.
title: You can't get a refund for shoes that…

author: Jorge
text: It asked me for an ID or passport and I'm not comfortable with that
title: It asked me for an ID or passport and…

author: John Philip Ensafian
text: No customer service to call about order issues and really bad shipping on their part. I won’t order from them again.
title: No customer service to call about order…

author: Alejandro
text: Apparently, my package was delivered, but I did not receive it.
title: Apparently

author: danny
text:
Being a frequent customer for the last 3 years and speanding around 12k dollars in their platform I get 0 help from them solving issues with my payment. I suspect they did something with my account after 1 of my sells didnt pass authentication(mind you this was a product I received from stockx originally but was kept in the box until I sold it back to them incl the stockx tag still on the item)

So after speaking to 4 different customer service employees over the course of 2 weeks and having to wait a couple of days in between replies I have pretty much heard everything but the solution:

1. Your paypal is rejecting the payment 2. your creditcard company is blocking the payment 3. “we do not recognize any issues but reset your payment information 4. We recognize the issue but wont do anything about it 5. Recognize the issue will firward to the right department and reset your payment information again. 6 now the app says my region is not correct while I made dozens of purchases with this region/address.

They made me reach out to both paypal and the bank twice, the bank even told me stockx was blocking the transaction! And they are still pretending everything else but them is causing this issue!

Can Stockx stop being shady and help me finally? Stop making me wait a couple of days in between replies. I haven’t received any help from you guys at all.
title: stockx support doesnt care about its customers, either playing around or has no clue

author: John E
text: Horrible customer service! StockX can't even afford a call center to deal with issues but reply with a low budget chat that are like robots. My product is held in customs because they don't know how to fill out custom forms. Don't buy here it will not be good
title: Horrible customer service

author: Chip
text: I ordered 1 pair of Jordan 1 pollen with a buy now bid. I was charged twice and sent 2 pair of Jordan 1 pollen. I only ordered 1 pair. There was no way for me to stop or cancel the 2nd pair. There was no number to call and the help tip didn’t provide me with the right information. So I’m stuck with 2 pair of the same shoe
title: I ordered 1 pair of Jordan 1 pollen…

author: Patrick
text: I ordered 2 pair of shoes the 1st pair I paid 199.00 and wasn't even the right shoes the 2nd pair was 150.00 and still have not received them I will not ever buy from here again
title: I ordered 2 pair of shoes the 1st pair…

author: Sergio Torres Sotelo
text:
I have been a customer of StockX for a while now, and I recently purchased some off-white shoes. The shoes I received where damaged, full of glue residue, logo damaged. I reached out to customer service thinking east simple return. I purchased $400 shoes, I received a damaged product, easy return like in any other company. To my surprise they are telling me that is passable to their standards that they can’t provide a refund.
I am in shock and disbelief that in 2022 you buy a product get a damaged one, and they won’t refund you.
title: Received damaged shoe and won’t get a refund.

author: Kimberly
text: I was disappointed because the shoe box has a large dent. The shoes were expensive and I expected perfection.
title: I was disappointed because the shoe box…

author: Herwin Brown
text: I haven’t received my order
title: I haven’t received my order

author: Nikisha Crosby
text: My shoe never got authenticated thus the poor rating
title: My shoe never got authenticated thus…
